definition: to miss/to shoot and miss the target/off the mark
to shed/to take off/to escape/to get away from

sentences.english: The team found off-target breaks in locations that were not predicted by conventional methods.
sentences.chinese: 研究小組發現了用傳統手段未能預測的脫靶中斷。

sentences.english: An example is given to analyze the precision in identification of target miss in azimuth.
sentences.chinese: 給出仿真算例分析脫靶方向角識別的精度。

sentences.english: Second, the compensation of the miss distance based on trajectory-control lateral-jets is researched.
sentences.chinese: 其次，研究了基於軌控直接側向力的脫靶量補償方法。

sentences.english: The effect on the interceptor's root-mean-square miss distance for the change of some parameters is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了某些參數對攔截導彈脫靶量均方根的影響。

sentences.english: But if you aim for nothing, you'll hit it every time.
sentences.chinese: 但是，假如你毫無目標，你將次次脫靶。
